title: Last activity you solved few questions. In this activity we give you some questions on Comments, try to answer those questions

options.option: To tell the computer what you mean in your program.
options.feedback: Incorrect! Comments are ignored by the computer.

options.option: For the people who are reading your code to know, in natural language, what the program is doing.
options.feedback: Correct! The computer ignores comments. It's for the humans that will "consume" your program.

options.option: Nothing, they are extraneous information that is not needed.
options.feedback: Incorrect! Comments can provide much needed information for anyone reading the program.

options.option: Nothing in a short program. They are only needed for really large programs.
options.feedback: Incorrect! Even small programs benefit from comments.
